remarks:
Deduction form of bound-variable hypothesis builder ~ hbim . (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 3-Jan-2018.) 

---

 Deduction form of bound-variable hypothesis builder ~ hbim . (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2002.)  (Revised by NM, 2-Feb-2015.)
statement:
hbimd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
hbimd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> A. x ps ) ) $.
hbimd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch -> A. x ch ) ) $.
hbimd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ps -> ch ) -> A. x ( ps -> ch ) ) ) $.
